constituent: droop, drop, silage, walking cane, stick, one, floor
heisigStory: A drop of . . . silage . . . walking stick . . . floor. The character is written in the order of its elements.
koohiiStory1: The thousand head of cattle let their heads droop as they devour the silage (animal fodder) that is lying on the floor around them.
koohiiStory2: Even a drop of silage is enough to make an old man with a walking stick droop low down to the floor. (rgravina - fixed up order).
kunYomi: た.れる、た.らす、た.れ、-た.れ、なんなんと.す
readingExamples: 垂らす (た.らす), 垂れる (た.れる)
words:
垂れる(たれる): to hang, to droop, to drop, to lower, to pull down, to dangle, to sag, to drip, to ooze, to trickle, to leave behind (at death), to give, to confer
垂直(すいちょく): vertical, perpendicular
